xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: 1. Segment net results are arrived after taking effect of Transfer Pricing. 2. As per RBI Circular DOR.AUT.REC.12/22/01.001/2022-23 dated April 07, 2022, for the purpose of disclosure under Accounting Standard 17, Segment reporting, Digital Banking has been identified as a sub- segment under the retail banking Segment.
